title: A way to scale up the minimap icons?
body:
Hi is there a way to increase the size of the champion icons on the minimap?
I already looked into some old threads about this but with no success.
The reason why i want this is because i have low vision and am very nearsighted and quite frankly i don't know whats going on on the minimap most of the time because the icons are tiny.
I don't really see what champion is appearing or which ones are enemies and allies when clashing on the other side of the map, and if i want to have map awareness i can't focus on the what i am doing on my screen because i have to watch the minimap so intently to figure out what's going on, it takes away from the joy of playing sometimes and makes it harder to progress as a player.
I found a way to increase the size of the minimap which helped a lot but the icons are still the same size.
I just wish Riot and other game developers would make games more user friendly towards people with low vision.
If any Riot employee happened to read this, would you please implement a tool to scale up the minimap icons.
Appreciate any help, thanks!

replies.body: Hmmmmm I hate to say it but I think scaling up the minimap is going to be the best option here =\ . It doesn't look like there are any options specifically for the minimap icons.
